name: shadow_demon_kill_01
text: Your soul will make a fine minion!
text_simple: your soul will make a fine minion

name: shadow_demon_kill_03
text: Slain you say? I hardly noticed.
text_simple: slain you say i hardly noticed

name: shadow_demon_kill_05
text: Cry for all the good it does you!
text_simple: cry for all the good it does you

name: shadow_demon_kill_07
text: Did you not see the demon in your gaze?
text_simple: did you not see the demon in your gaze

name: shadow_demon_kill_08
text: Look to the shadows for a taste of your fate.
text_simple: look to the shadows for a taste of your fate

text_simple: the weeping is yours the laughter is all mine ha ha ha ha ha

name: shadow_demon_rival_01
text: My shadow rises while your shadow falls.
text_simple: my shadow rises while your shadow falls

name: shadow_demon_rival_02
text: Whatever hell you came from will have to take you back.
text_simple: whatever hell you came from will have to take you back

name: shadow_demon_rival_07
text: The nightmares you harvest are like sweet dreams to me.
text_simple: the nightmares you harvest are like sweet dreams to me

name: shadow_demon_rival_08
text: You might be a power in the underscape, but here, you're a damp spark.
text_simple: you might be a power in the underscape but here youre a damp spark

name: shadow_demon_rival_09
text: The demon that made Clinkz botched the job if you ask me.
text_simple: the demon that made clinkz botched the job if you ask me

name: shadow_demon_rival_10
text: I'll never come to your call.
text_simple: ill never come to your call

name: shadow_demon_rival_11
text: Warlock, you should have written your memoir, not your grimoire.
text_simple: warlock you should have written your memoir not your grimoire

name: shadow_demon_rival_12
text: Omniknight, you were wholly a nuisance.
text_simple: omniknight you were wholly a nuisance

name: shadow_demon_rival_13
text: There lies Chen. Never were followers more misguided.
text_simple: there lies chen never were followers more misguided

text_simple: ozh icha tak lash i will take my share
